articles.description: There have been a total of 13 video assistant referee (VAR) mistakes in the Premier League so far this season, say league bosses.
articles.title: Premier League: 13 VAR mistakes in total in season so far, say chiefs

articles.description: Mikel Arteta says he is disappointed by Arsenal's failure to make any signings during the winter transfer window, but praises the club's discipline.
articles.title: Arsenal: Mikel Arteta 'disappointed' by quiet transfer window but praises club's 'discipline'

articles.description: Chelsea forward Joao Felix completes a loan move to AC Milan until the end of the season.
articles.title: Joao Felix transfer: Chelsea forward joins AC Milan on loan until end of season

articles.description: As the winter transfer window closes, BBC Sport's chief football writer Phil McNulty gives his verdict.
articles.title: Phil McNulty's deadline day verdict: Manchester United, Arsenal, Man City, Tottenham and Aston Villa

articles.description: Two-time Grand Slam champion and former world number one Simona Halep retires from tennis.
articles.title: Simona Halep: Two-time Grand Slam champion and former world number one retires

articles.description: Chelsea striker Samantha Kerr denies causing racially aggravated harassment to a police officer.
articles.title: Sam Kerr trial: Met Police officer challenged in court over motives

articles.description: Manchester City say they are "appalled" by the racist and misogynistic abuse suffered by striker Khadija 'Bunny' Shaw following Sunday's loss to Arsenal.
articles.title: Khadija Shaw: Manchester City 'appalled' after forward subjected to racist and misogynistic abuse

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu is out of the Abu Dhabi Open after losing in straight sets to former Wimbledon champion Marketa Vondrousova in the first round.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: Briton loses in Abu Dhabi Open first round to Marketa Vondrousova

articles.description: Tiger Woods pays tribute to his "biggest fan and greatest supporter" after announcing the death of his mother, Kultida.
articles.title: Tiger Woods pays tribute to 'biggest fan' after announcing death of mother Kutilda

articles.description: Who stood out? Who slipped up? This year's Six Nations doubles as an audition for selection for the British and Irish Lions tour of Australia in the summer.
articles.title: Six Nations: British and Irish Lions possibles press claims
